text: Tommy is like the smart one because he didn't.
He's the only one of them who didn't work in comms.
You see Obama cloned 80 million Spartans all named John with no age to work in Comms, but then he had Tommy who is the policy guy.
See all the Jons are like little labrador retrievers just running around.
But Tommy's smart, Tommy's like a cocker spaniel.
